answer: The British FCO seems to indicate that Dengue Fever is still a risk in Mexico http www.fco.gov.uk en travel and living abroad travel advice by country north central america mexico1 a Scroll down or CTRL F to find the passage about Dengue Fever
subtitle: On my last few trips to Mexico I met more and more people on the Oaxaca coast who had caught dengue fever. But now that I haven't been for a few years is it less of a concern now or has it become even more rampant?
title: Is dengue fever still on the rise in Mexico or is it subsiding?
